South Texas seems to have a high amount of paranormal activity. There also =
are a lot of Satanic activity around here also. Stay away from the Ouija, p=
laying with that only brings trouble.
             Larry
  ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
  From: gamedazed 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tue=
sday, February 17, 2009 7:06 PM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Hello


  I wonder=
 if there is an above average spiritual activity in Texas.
  I've always th=
ought that certain parts held particularly high
  activity, and I know many=
 people who are into either magic or
  communication with spirits - which o=
ften involves ouija - so I wonder
  if they're linked @.@
